title: Ousted Afghan President Ashraf Ghani's Facebook Account Hacked
content:
1. Ousted Afghan President Ashraf Ghani's Facebook Account Hacked  NPR
  2. Last president of Afghanistan says his Facebook account was hacked when it posted a message telling people to accept Taliban rule  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Afghan business owners fear economic collapse over sanctions  Al Jazeera English
  4. Twitter removes verification badge from some ministries account  Pajhwok Afghan News
  5. 'Account Hacked', Says Former Afghan Prez Ghani After Facebook Post Calls For Recognising Taliban  News18
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
